pullRequest.title: Do compression via tar and not zip
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description:

It seems that the current compression of zip is very finicky when it comes to filenames with utf-8 characters this has to do with the zip's reliance on platform encodings. For example some servers will have safe-mode errors because of the encodings not unzipping properly. To resolve this, we should be using the tar.gz which is universal across many platforms.

New Nodes/Commands/ConfigOptions:

Changed default node plugin.database.flatfile_backup to plugin.database.flatfile_backup_type and the default value is now tar
it will still work if the value is zip so it's backward compatible.


 I have tested this pull request for defects on a server.
